text:
While certain boot styles are classics (think your go-to black ankle boots or sleek over-the-knee boots), every season, an updated silhouette enters the boot game. Case in point is the slouchy-boot trend. We first saw the look on the runway at the Saint Laurent show (sparkle boots, in case you needed a refresher), and then, of course, there was Rihanna debuting the look fresh off the runway days after the show. Now that we’ve fully entered boot season, there’s a collection of celebrities who have added slouchy, oversize boots to their fall outfit rotations. From Victoria Beckham to Kendall Jenner, each stylish celeb has convinced us to shop the style stat. Keep reading to see how to style the trend-driven boots, and add a pair to your boot collection at the end.

Check out fall's biggest boot trend below.
